Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Wow!{Line} This is so cool!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Wow!{Line} This is so cool!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Mind if I look around?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Mind if I look around?”

Monologue.Current: “Thanks!”
Monologue.Original: “Thanks!”

Monologue.Current: “Did you hear!?{Line} They’re going to cut the{Line} library budget again!”
Monologue.Original: “Did you hear!?{Line} They’re going to cut the{Line} library budget again!”

Monologue.Current: “Why do they always do that!?{Line} Do they have some kind of{Line} grudge against us?”
Monologue.Original: “Why do they always do that!?{Line} Do they have some kind of{Line} grudge against us?”

Monologue.Current: “Out of all the committees,{Line} we, the library committee, are the only ones{Line} beneficial to studying!”
Monologue.Original: “Out of all the committees,{Line} we, the library committee, are the only ones{Line} beneficial to studying!”

Monologue.Current: “I know, seriously!{Line} We get the same amount as the{Line} disciplinary committee. How sad is that!?”
Monologue.Original: “I know, seriously!{Line} We get the same amount as the{Line} disciplinary committee. How sad is that!?”

Monologue.Current: “Oh my-oh my...{Line} ...Well, at least we have{Line} a different budget to buy books with.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh my-oh my...{Line} ...Well, at least we have{Line} a different budget to buy books with.”

Monologue.Current: “But, but... What about our...{Pause 80}{Line} ...snacks?{Line} Now that adds up too, you know!”
Monologue.Original: “But, but... What about our...{Pause 80}{Line} ...snacks?{Line} Now that adds up too, you know!”

Monologue.Current: “Sometimes there’s nothing to do.{Line} All you do is just sit here.”
Monologue.Original: “Sometimes there’s nothing to do.{Line} All you do is just sit here.”

Monologue.Current: “That’s right! Eating snacks and{Line} chatting is part of our job.”
Monologue.Original: “That’s right! Eating snacks and{Line} chatting is part of our job.”

Monologue.Current: “Надеюсь, там ещё осталось место...”
Monologue.Original: “I hope there’s a seat left...”

Monologue.Current: “В читалке всегда полно людей...”
Monologue.Original: “There’s always a lot of people{Line} in the reading room.”

Monologue.Current: “Сидят, болтают, играют...{Line} Хоть бы кто-нибудь читал!..”
Monologue.Original: “And not everyone’s there to{Line} read books, either!”

Monologue.Current: “Никого нет...”
Monologue.Original: “No one on the library committee’s here...”

Monologue.Current: “Наверное, я могу взять книгу{Line} и просто оставить записку?..”
Monologue.Original: “I wonder if I can just leave a note{Line} or something and check out this book?”

Monologue.Current: “Здесь так много интересных книг!”
Monologue.Original: “There’s so much competition{Line} for books before a test.”

Monologue.Current: “Смотрю вот... глаза разбегаются!”
Monologue.Original: “That’s why I’m{Line} scoping out a book now.”

Monologue.Current: “О, чувак, ты вовремя!{Line} У меня вопрос по истории Эстара!{Line} Помнишь, историк втирал про злую волшебницу?{Line} Я тогда закосил...”
Monologue.Original: “I have a question for ya!{Line} Esthar was the country that was governed{Line} by this evil sorceress way back when, right?”

Monologue.Current: “Короче, тётку свергли.{Line} А что потом? Её мочканули?”
Monologue.Original: “So what happened to this sorceress?{Line} Did someone overthrow the sorceress?{Line} Did we learn about this in class?”

Monologue.Current: “Блин... никто не знает.{Line} Чувствую, отправит он меня на пересдачу...”
Monologue.Original: “I think I cut class that day, so, like,{Line} I have no idea what this sorceress is about.”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“If there’s a book you’re looking for,{Line} please let one of the library committee know.{Line} We’ll be happy to help you.”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“If there’s a book you’re looking for,{Line} please let one of the library committee know.{Line} We’ll be happy to help you.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“I’ve been waitin’ FOREVER for{Line} ‘Good-bye Pururun’. Has anyone{Line} returned it yet?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“I’ve been waitin’ FOREVER for{Line} ‘Good-bye Pururun’. Has anyone{Line} returned it yet?”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Oh... Z-Zell...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Oh... Z-Zell...”

Monologue.Current: “I...I’ll put a search on that...{Line} P-Please hold on a second...”
Monologue.Original: “I...I’ll put a search on that...{Line} P-Please hold on a second...”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“So the new issue isn’t in yet.{Line} I was looking forward to it.”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“So the new issue isn’t in yet.{Line} I was looking forward to it.”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“I...I’m sorry.{Line} I was so busy with the{Line} budget meeting and all...”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“I...I’m sorry.{Line} I was so busy with the{Line} budget meeting and all...”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Oh, I’m in no rush.{Line} Besides, I don’t have much time to read.”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Oh, I’m in no rush.{Line} Besides, I don’t have much time to read.”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“Yes, I’m sure.{Line} SeeDs must be{Line} very busy.”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“Yes, I’m sure.{Line} SeeDs must be{Line} very busy.”

Monologue.Current: “P-Please stop by again!”
Monologue.Original: “P-Please stop by again!”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Yeah sure, thanks.”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Yeah sure, thanks.”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“You a SeeD, like me?{Line} Well, good luck to ya.”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“You a SeeD, like me?{Line} Well, good luck to ya.”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“OH-MY-GOSH...!!!{Line} He spoke to me!!!”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“OH-MY-GOSH...!!!{Line} He spoke to me!!!”

Monologue.Current: “That SeeD comes to the library often.{Line} He’s been our topic of conversation lately.”
Monologue.Original: “That SeeD comes to the library often.{Line} He’s been our topic of conversation lately.”

Monologue.Current: Библиотекарша с косичкой{Line}“В библиотеке запрещено:{Pause 80}{Line} 1. Бегать.{Pause 80}{Line} 2. Громко разговаривать.{Pause 80}{Line} 3. Принимать пищу.{Pause 80}
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“The following acts are prohibited{Line} within the library:{Pause 80}{Line} 1. Talking loudly.{Pause 80}{Line} 2. Eating and drinking.{Pause 80}{Line} 3. Running around.”

Monologue.Current: “А также...{Pause 80}{Line} 4. Задерживать взятые книги.{Pause 80}{Line} ...{Pause 80}{Line} И, пожалуйста, не деритесь за места!”
Monologue.Original: “And also...{Pause 80}{Line} 4. Avoid late returns.{Pause 80}{Line} 5. No fighting over seats.”

Monologue.Current: “Ох, простите. Я должна рассказать{Line} правила библиотеки детям из{Line} нового набора.”
Monologue.Original: “I have to go over the library rules{Line} with the children, next period.”

Monologue.Current: “Я так нервничаю...”
Monologue.Original: “I’m very nervous.{Line} I hope they understand...”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“It’s just so amazing{Line} that Garden moves...”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“It’s just so amazing{Line} that Garden moves...”

Monologue.Current: “We can travel all over{Line} without spending a Gil.”
Monologue.Original: “We can travel all over{Line} without spending a Gil.”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“Maybe there’s romance awaiting{Line} me in a foreign land...”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“Maybe there’s romance awaiting{Line} me in a foreign land...”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“(sigh...) I’m bored...”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“(sigh...) I’m bored...”

Monologue.Current: “It’s nice to be able to visit{Line} other cities, but if you’re not careful,{Line} you could be left behind.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s nice to be able to visit{Line} other cities, but if you’re not careful,{Line} you could be left behind.”

Monologue.Current: “With all that turmoil with {Term Galbadia}{Line} and the sorceress...it’s dangerous...”
Monologue.Original: “With all that turmoil with {Term Galbadia}{Line} and the sorceress...it’s dangerous...”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“By the way... How long must I be{Line} on the library committee?”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“By the way... How long must I be{Line} on the library committee?”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“Oh, Zell...{Pause 88}{Line} That girl...{Pause 64}...{Pause 64} You know, with a pigtail.{Pause 80}{Line} Have you seen her?”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“Oh, Zell...{Pause 88}{Line} That girl...{Pause 64}...{Pause 64} You know, with a pigtail.{Pause 80}{Line} Have you seen her?”

Monologue.Current: “She’s been looking all over for you.{Line} She wants to give you something.{Line} Maybe you should go look for her, too!”
Monologue.Original: “She’s been looking all over for you.{Line} She wants to give you something.{Line} Maybe you should go look for her, too!”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“You know the girl with a pigtail on the{Line} library committee? Have you seen her?”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“You know the girl with a pigtail on the{Line} library committee? Have you seen her?”

Monologue.Current: “She said she wanted to give you something.{Line} She’s been looking for you, Zell.{Line} I wonder where she could be?”
Monologue.Original: “She said she wanted to give you something.{Line} She’s been looking for you, Zell.{Line} I wonder where she could be?”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“This is where we come in!{Line} We have to get those two together!”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“This is where we come in!{Line} We have to get those two together!”

Monologue.Current: “Back and forth to the library...{Line} I don’t even read or check out books...”
Monologue.Original: “Back and forth to the library...{Line} I don’t even read or check out books...”

Monologue.Current: “N-No... It’s not like I’m interested{Line} in someone from the library committee!”
Monologue.Original: “N-No... It’s not like I’m interested{Line} in someone from the library committee!”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Hey, it’s you again.{Line} Aren’t there 3 of you on the{Line} library committee?”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Hey, it’s you again.{Line} Aren’t there 3 of you on the{Line} library committee?”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“Well, since the 3 of us are so close,{Line} we’re pretty flexible with our schedules.”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“Well, since the 3 of us are so close,{Line} we’re pretty flexible with our schedules.”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Is the girl with a pigtail{Line} off today?”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Is the girl with a pigtail{Line} off today?”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“Y-Yes, she is...{Line} ......”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“Y-Yes, she is...{Line} ......”

Monologue.Current: “...Can I help you?”
Monologue.Original: “...Can I help you?”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Nah...{Line} That’s ok, thanks.”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“Nah...{Line} That’s ok, thanks.”

Monologue.Current: Conceited SeeD{Line}“You a SeeD, like me?{Line} Well, good luck to ya.”
Monologue.Original: Conceited SeeD{Line}“You a SeeD, like me?{Line} Well, good luck to ya.”

Monologue.Current: Library Committee Member{Line}“...What do you think?{Line} Do you think that maybe HE{Line} likes HER?”
Monologue.Original: Library Committee Member{Line}“...What do you think?{Line} Do you think that maybe HE{Line} likes HER?”

Monologue.Current: “Maybe, but who cares!{Line} We know she likes someone else,{Line} so we have to back her up!”
Monologue.Original: “Maybe, but who cares!{Line} We know she likes someone else,{Line} so we have to back her up!”

Monologue.Current: Найден журнал [Сверхестественное I]!
Monologue.Original: Received [Occult Fan I]!

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}! Everyone’s here, too!{Pause 88}{Line} Are you here to read books?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}! Everyone’s here, too!{Pause 88}{Line} Are you here to read books?”

Monologue.Current: “The books here are so interesting.{Line} They have a lot of romance novels, too.”
Monologue.Original: “The books here are so interesting.{Line} They have a lot of romance novels, too.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“The library’s taking requests for books{Line} right now. Maybe I should{Line} put in some requests, too!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“The library’s taking requests for books{Line} right now. Maybe I should{Line} put in some requests, too!”

Monologue.Current: “...What kind of books do I want...{Line} ...Hmmmm...”
Monologue.Original: “...What kind of books do I want...{Line} ...Hmmmm...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So, Zell. When did you put in{Line} your request to the library?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So, Zell. When did you put in{Line} your request to the library?”

Monologue.Current: “What’s the ‘Pupurun’ series?{Line} What kind of book is it???”
Monologue.Original: “What’s the ‘Pupurun’ series?{Line} What kind of book is it???”

Monologue.Current: “I heard there’s a weird book{Line} somewhere in the library.”
Monologue.Original: “I heard there’s a weird book{Line} somewhere in the library.”

Monologue.Current: “I wonder what kind of book it is?”
Monologue.Original: “I wonder what kind of book it is?”

Monologue.Current: “Я не очень хорошо играю...{Line} Но, если хочешь...”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “I...I’m not very good at cards...”{Line}Yes{Line}No
